definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: And the superego is the internalized rules of parents in society.
sentences.chinese: 超我是社會家庭規範的內化。

sentences.english: The healing of fracture mainly is the acceleration of osteogenic activities and endochondral ossification.
sentences.chinese: 骨折癒合主要是成骨活動及軟骨內化骨加速。

sentences.english: It is the nucleus of the internalised Original Object.
sentences.chinese: 是被內化了的原始客體的核心。

sentences.english: Keep a journal. This is a powerful way of not internalising your anger.
sentences.chinese: 它是不將憤怒內化的有力途徑。

sentences.english: And unlike Westernization, it is an internalizing process.
sentences.chinese: 與西化不同，中國化是一種內化的過程。

sentences.english: Second step, partial wearing, internalizes the knowledge main point.
sentences.chinese: 第二步，局部磨合，內化知識要點。

sentences.english: Conversely, low to moderate tensile strain and stress is associated with direct repair, or intramembranous ossification.
sentences.chinese: 適度的張應力，可產生直接修復或膜內化骨。

sentences.english: The principle of establishing the property right system is the interiorization of externality cost of mine enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 產權制度建立的原則是將礦山企業負外部性成本內化。

sentences.english: That is how I conceptualize the process of transmuting internalization now.
sentences.chinese: 這是我現在對蛻變性內化的理解。

sentences.english: I want to elaborate on some of my ideas about transmuting internalization.
sentences.chinese: 我想更詳細闡述我對蛻變性內化的看法。

sentences.english: Acknowledge the energy that comes with competition and harness it internally.
sentences.chinese: 承認競爭所帶來的動力，並把它內化在心裏。

sentences.english: In other words, passion helps you internalize the efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 換言之，熱情幫你將效率內化。

sentences.english: That's when you start to internalise and believe it.
sentences.chinese: 那就是你將它“內化”和信它的開始。

sentences.english: The mass media should emphasize the value of the concept of internalization and infiltration;
sentences.chinese: 後者重在強調大衆傳播的價值滲透與觀念內化。

sentences.english: The obvious feature of Yu Dafu's works is the emotionally internal tendency.
sentences.chinese: 情感的內化性傾向是郁達夫小說創作的突出特點。

definition: to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
